name: ICEBreaker (towerofeuphoria)
description:
Bunker crawling exploration game in a darkly humorous world. Discover why a refuge from the end of the world turned into a new kind of hell.

Forgot to mention in the credits, sorry:

Glitch Effect shader by arlez 80, on Godot Shaders

Shining Sprite Effect by Casual Garage Coder, on Godot Shaders

Nokia FC font by Zeh Fernando
